snippet: “We already have a president now that has no class. We have a president now, that, you know, does selfie stick videos, that invites YouTube stars there, you know, people who eat cereal out of a bathtub.” — Senator Marco Rubio
abstract: “We already have a president now that has no class. We have a president now, that, you know, does selfie stick videos, that invites YouTube stars there, you know, people who eat cereal out of a bathtub.” — Senator Marco Rubio

headline.main: Verbatim: Marco Rubio Says the President ‘Has No Class’
